skillTree.localised_description: A vast, mobile altar allows the souls of the slain to be ritualistically condemned directly from the field of slaughter.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

A unit with the Mark of Khorne has:
	➕ Frenzy Passive Ability
	➕ Increased  Spell Resistance
	➕ Increased  Armour
	➖ Reduced  Melee Defence

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +1 for "Gate of Khorne"
Ability number of uses: +2 for "Gate of Khorne"

skillTree.localised_description: At times, this servant of Khorne storms across the battlefield with arrows lodged in his chest. However, they seem to do little but further stoke the raging fire of his wrath.
Few magics can worm their way through this one's skull; their Khornate collar offers adequate protection, as does the impenetrable, relentless fury infecting his mind.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: When facing the defiant realms of Order, the Skullpriest and his kin strike with unmatched ferocity, their hatred of fragile flesh and false gods boiling over in unrelenting brutality.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves, Lizardmen, Dwarfs and men
	(all units in army)

Increased experience gain: +10% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: Raised high amid the carnage, the totems of the Blood God exude unbreakable will, their profane presence turning mortals into living effigies of endless slaughter.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.
Entities in this unit take damage, but cannot die.

skillTree.localised_description: A chosen warrior is blessed with boundless, wrathful might, burning so fiercely with destructive power that the sheer fury consumes their very being in a final blaze of carnage.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero
Hasn't got the Mark of Khorne

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.
Entities in this unit take damage, but cannot die.

skillTree.localised_description: As fear grips fleeing foes, the Skullpriest’s forces surge forward, quickened and emboldened by the prey's despair, striking with relentless, predatory purpose.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.

skillTree.localised_description: The cries of the dying twist the winds of magic, choking out spells and weaving a red mist of fury that clouds all but the thirst for vengeance.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.

skillTree.localised_description: With a guttural chant and a jagged gesture, the Skullpriest rips the soul-essence from his victims, birthing Bloodletters in a searing cascade of hellish wrath.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
No foe remains a threat once torn limb from bloody limb!
"KILL! KILL THEM ALL!"
"Raze it all to the ground! Leave nothing standing!"
With every other thought squeezed from his mind, there is naught left of this one but the screaming song of slaughter.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Death, malice, butchery and murder – the enemies of Khorne shall have it all.
"None shall run far! None shall be able to hide! All will come to sufferance!"
"Modulistic terror – a vast, sadistic feast. The only way to exit is going piece by piece."
All will know agony, pulverised by the inescapable grip of the Blood God's hatred.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Khorne corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Khorne corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Khorne corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

A unit with the Mark of Khorne has:
	➕ Frenzy Passive Ability
	➕ Increased  Spell Resistance
	➕ Increased  Armour
	➖ Reduced  Melee Defence

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +25%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +500 metres without incurring any time penalty

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab or gouge, it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This one knows exactly what needs to be done to ensure that the Murder God gains advantage over His foes.
If you don't kill them outright, to spill their blood and scar them for life is almost as good.
"My hammer's a cold piece of blood-lethal steel. I grin while you writhe with the pain that I deal!"
If there's trouble to be had – and by that I mean the worst kind of slaughter – this one will always be at the centre of things, instigating the conflict.
